article_title: Political foes unite in fight to repeal 'Cadillac tax'
article_text:
Fueled by employer and labor union lobbying, Congressional support to repeal the health care reform law's highly unpopular 40% excise tax has grown rapidly in recent weeks, but the push faces several obstacles.

Coincidentally, the effort comes as a study by the International Foundation of Employee Benefit Plans released this month found that nearly 60% of employers and other health care

og.description: The health care reform law's 40% excise tax continues to win unpopularity contests in Congress....
